verses.verse: Him that is <S%G770>weak<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4355>receive<s%> you, but not to <S%G1261>doubtful<s%> <S%G1253>disputations.<s%>
For <S%G3739>one<s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> that he may <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things: <S%G3739>another,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is <S%G770>weak,<s%> <S%G2068>eats<s%> <S%G3001>herbs.<s%>

Let not him that <S%G2068>eats<s%> <S%G1848>despise<s%> him that <S%G2068>eats<s%> not; and let not him which <S%G2068>eats<s%> not <S%G2919>judge<s%> him that <S%G2068>eats:<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4355>received<s%> him.

<S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> you that <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G245>another<s%> <S%G245>man's<s%> <S%G3610>servant?<s%> to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2962>master<s%> he <S%G4739>stands<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4098>falls.<s%> <S%G235>Yes,<s%> he shall be <S%G2476>held<s%> up: for <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1415>able<s%> to <S%G2476>make<s%> him <S%G2476>stand.<s%>

<S%G3739>One<s%> <S%G3303><s%> man <S%G2919>esteems<s%> one <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3844>above<s%> <S%G3739>another<s%>: another <S%G2919>esteems<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> alike. Let <S%G1538>every<s%> man be <S%G4135>fully<s%> <S%G4135>persuaded<s%> in his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3563>mind.<s%>

He that <S%G5426>regards<s%> the <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G5426>regards<s%> it to the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> and he that <S%G5426>regards<s%> not the <S%G2250>day,<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> he does not <S%G5426>regard<s%> it. He that <S%G2068>eats,<s%> <S%G2068>eats<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> for he gives <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2168>thanks;<s%> and he that <S%G2068>eats<s%> not, to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> he <S%G2068>eats<s%> not, and gives <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2168>thanks.<s%>
For <S%G3762>none<s%> of us <S%G2198>lives<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G599>dies<s%> to <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

For <S%G1437>whether<s%> <S%G5037><s%> we <S%G2198>live,<s%> we <S%G2198>live<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> and <S%G1437>whether<s%> <S%G5037><s%> we <S%G599>die,<s%> we <S%G599>die<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G1437>whether<s%> <S%G5037><s%> we <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5037>or<s%> <S%G599>die,<s%> we are the <S%G2962>Lord's.<s%>

For to <S%G5124>this<s%> end <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G599>died,<s%> and <S%G450>rose,<s%> and <S%G326>revived,<s%> that he might be <S%G2961>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> and <S%G2198>living.<s%>

But <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G2919>judge<s%> your <S%G80>brother?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G1848>set<s%> <S%G1848>at<s%> <S%G1848>nothing<s%> your <S%G80>brother?<s%> for we shall <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3936>stand<s%> <S%G3936>before<s%> the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> As I <S%G2198>live,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1119>knee<s%> shall <S%G2578>bow<s%> to me, and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> shall <S%G1843>confess<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> one of us shall <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> of <S%G1438>himself<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Let us not <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G3371>any<s%> <S%G2001>more:<s%> but <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3123>rather,<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> man <S%G5087>put<s%> a stumbling <S%G4348>block<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G4625>occasion<s%> to <S%G4625>fall<s%> in his <S%G80>brother's<s%> way.

I <S%G1492>know,<s%> and am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> by the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> that there is <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G2839>unclean<s%> of <S%G1438>itself:<s%> but to him that <S%G3049>esteems<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing to be <S%G2839>unclean,<s%> to him it is <S%G2839>unclean.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> your <S%G80>brother<s%> be <S%G3076>grieved<s%> with your <S%G1033>meat,<s%> <S%G3765>now<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> you not <S%G2596>charitably.<s%> <S%G26><s%> <S%G622>Destroy<s%> not him with your <S%G1033>meat,<s%> for <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died.<s%>
Let not <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> be evil <S%G987>spoken<s%> of:

For the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is not <S%G1035>meat<s%> and <S%G4213>drink;<s%> but <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> and <S%G5479>joy<s%> in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>
For he that in <S%G5125>these<s%> things <S%G1398>serves<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2101>acceptable<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G1384>approved<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>

Let us <S%G686>therefore<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G1377>follow<s%> <S%G1377>after<s%> the things which make for <S%G1515>peace,<s%> and things with which <S%G240>one<s%> may <S%G3619>edify<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

For <S%G1033>meat<s%> <S%G2647>destroy<s%> not the <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> things <S%G3303>indeed<s%> are <S%G2513>pure;<s%> but it is <S%G2556>evil<s%> for that <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2068>eats<s%> with <S%G4348>offense.<s%>

It is <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3361>neither<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G2907>flesh,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G3362>any<s%> thing <S%G1722>whereby<s%> <S%G3739><s%> your <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G4350>stumbles,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> is <S%G4624>offended,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> is <S%G770>made<s%> <S%G770>weak.<s%>

<S%G2192>Have<s%> you <S%G4102>faith?<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> it to <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G3107>Happy<s%> is he that <S%G2919>comdemns<s%> not <S%G1438>himself<s%> in that thing <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G1381>allows.<s%>

And he that <S%G1252>doubts<s%> is <S%G2632>damned<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G5315>eat,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G2068>eats<s%> not of <S%G4102>faith:<s%> for <S%G3956>whatever<s%> is not of <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G266>sin.<s%>
